detectors.description:
SafeERC20.safeTransfer(Token,address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/841A63D6B17927de583404BcDC5281B99A0b801D_Sellix.sol#83-95) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- prevBalance - _value == _token.balanceOf(address(this)) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/841A63D6B17927de583404BcDC5281B99A0b801D_Sellix.sol#94)

Sellix.withdrawEth(address,uint256).addr (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/841A63D6B17927de583404BcDC5281B99A0b801D_Sellix.sol#133) lacks a zero-check on :
		- addr.transfer(amount * 1) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/841A63D6B17927de583404BcDC5281B99A0b801D_Sellix.sol#134)

Sellix.multiPayoutEth(address[],uint256[]) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/841A63D6B17927de583404BcDC5281B99A0b801D_Sellix.sol#160-176) has external calls inside a loop: addresses[j].transfer(amounts[j] * 1) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/841A63D6B17927de583404BcDC5281B99A0b801D_Sellix.sol#172)
detectors.markdown: [Sellix.multiPayoutEth(address[],uint256[])](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/841A63D6B17927de583404BcDC5281B99A0b801D_Sellix.sol#L160-L176) has external calls inside a loop: [addresses[j].transfer(amounts[j] * 1)](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/841A63D6B17927de583404BcDC5281B99A0b801D_Sellix.sol#L172)
